description: I think it's more intuitive to use the Flavor ID or the Flavor name for the parameter --flavor (for the command nova boot) (and not only the Flavor ID). In a big environment the Flavor ID could be a very big integer. I  don't want to call "nova flavor-list" every time to catch the Flavor ID. Remembering "m1.tiny" or something like that is simpler (at least for myself).
title: should be possible to use the flavor name for 'nova boot --flavor='
